snippet: The mayor of Austin, Tex., said that Formula One officials could not look to the state for a bailout of the financially struggling United States Grand Prix.
abstract: Mayor Steve Adler of Austin, Tex, says state will not rescue financially foundering United States Grand Prix.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of Austin, Tex., said that Formula One officials could not look to the state for a bailout of the financially struggling United States Grand Prix.

headline.main: No Bailout for U.S. Grand Prix
headline.print_headline: No Bailout for U.S. Grand Prix
